meanings.definition: To shape or mold (a material such as clay or stone) into a desired form.
meanings.sent1: She sculpts a small bird out of clay in art class.
meanings.sent2: The artist sculpts a beautiful vase from a block of marble.
meanings.sent3: The child sculpts a lopsided snowman that makes everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her words sculpts a vision of hope in the minds of the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor carefully sculpts the details of the face, bringing it to life.

meanings.definition: To create or produce (a work of art) by shaping or molding a material.
meanings.sent1: He sculpts a masterpiece from clay with skilled hands.
meanings.sent2: The potter sculpts a unique bowl on the wheel.
meanings.sent3: The chef sculpts a dessert that looks like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sculpts a melody that lingers in the air.
meanings.sent5: The painter sculpts a scene of tranquility on the canvas.

meanings.definition: To carve or chisel (a sculpture) from a material.
meanings.sent1: The artist sculpts a lion out of wood with precision.
meanings.sent2: She sculpts a figure from ice for the winter festival.
meanings.sent3: The baker sculpts a cake into the shape of a castle.
meanings.sent4: His actions sculpts a path for others to follow.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor sculpts a statue that captures the essence of emotion.
